commit message: First version of pinch/tap zooming. Still needs finishing.

Moved code to services and injected them to activities.
Refactored CoordinateUtil to service and injected to classes.
LocationService and PreferenceService
Added singleton and contentview annotations.
PageService and BitmapService. Refactorings with injections to AnimationActivity and view. Refactored tasks to RoboBuice tasks.
Refactored mainly AnimationActivity and view.
Small tweaks and readme files updates.
Moved HTTPUtil and HTMLUtil to services and injected them.
Added simple test for httpservice class. Removed unused imports.
Added some tests for MainActivity. Downgraded robolectric to 1.1 because of problems with 1.2 version.

Small tweaks. Disabled debug mode.

Added a simple working robotium test.
Added some more robotium test cases.
Added development and production profiles. Added Enviroment.java which can be used for environment (profile) specific settings.
Added some debug prints for development environment.
Fixed robotium tests.
Added more debug logging.
Added testing guidelines.
Small logging changes.
Added SVG map pointer.

Removed unnecessary copyrights.
Width of the map marker scaled a bit larger.
Added color picker as apkLib dependency. Map marker color can now be changed from the preferences.
Added sources for svg-android because needs to modify the opacity handling.
Fixed opacity bug in android svg parser.
Added colorpicker sources because it also needs to be modified.
Added missing colorpicker java sources.
Some changes to color picker dialog layout.

Added map marker size to preferences and restructured preferences.
Tweaked showing the municipality toast.
Added preference dependency
Some municipality toast more higher.
Allow moving map out of bounds because of zooming functionality.
